column2: Orc]] under the command of [[Shagrat]] at the Tower of [[Cirith Ungol]].  During the [[Battle of Cirith Ungol]] Radbug had his eyes squeezed out by Shagrat, killing him.  It is believed that Radbug had refused to obey him.<ref>{{HM
column3: Guide}}, p. 325, entry "Radbug"</ref> Shagrat threatened the Orc [[Snaga]] with a similar fate if he didn't follow his orders.<ref>{{RK
